sources.name: ParquetSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		First_Name as string,
		Last_Name as string,
		Date as string,
		Zipcode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100) ~> ParquetSource

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ID']) ~> sink1

transformations.name: DerivedColumn1
transformations.script:
ParquetSource derive(ID = toInteger(ID),
		First_Name = toString(First_Name),
		Last_Name = toString(Last_Name),
		Date = toDate(Date, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		Zipcode = toInteger(Zipcode),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
